ygData.subject: Mask of the deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a lvl 22 Cleric and would like to be heading to the LavaStorm Mtn s.  Now of course I know I can get an invis and make the run but I d kinda like to take
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a lvl 22 Cleric and would like to be heading to the LavaStorm Mtn's. Now of course I know I can get an invis and make the run but I'd kinda like to take the time to wonder around neriak and surrounding areas. Since I killed DE Guards for bronze so often I'm not KOS. I'm trying to locate the mask of deceivers which when worn and rt clicked will transform my appearance to that of a DE. Does anyone know where I can locate such an iteM?

Duhas Alegulper
Tarew Marr
